name: convertSparseTileRegions(_:toPixelRegions:withTileSize:numRegions:)
desc: Converts a list of regions, specified in sparse tile coordinates, to pixel units.
declaration:
optional func convertSparseTileRegions(_ tileRegions: UnsafePointer<MTLRegion>, 
                        toPixelRegions pixelRegions: UnsafeMutablePointer<MTLRegion>, 
                          withTileSize tileSize: MTLSize, 
                            numRegions: Int)
